description: The cpuUtilizationExceeded notification indicates that the sending
agent sense that the CPU utilization has passed the
program threshold.

event.Summary: CPU utilization ( $v1% ) is above high limit threshold ( $v2% )

description: The current level in percent of CPU utilization
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::monCpuUtilization

description: High limit in percent of normal CPU utilization
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::cpuUtilizationThreshold

description: The ramFreeSpaceExceeded notification indicates that the sending
agent sense that the system memory utilization has passed the
program threshold.

event.Summary: RAM free space ( $v1 bytes ) is below low limit threshold ( $v2 bytes )

description: The number of bytes currently free in the system memory
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::monRamBytesFree

description: Low limit in bytes free in the system memory
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::ramBytesFreeThreshold

description: The portErrorsExceeded notification indicates that the sending
agent sense that the level of errors on the port
has passed the program threshold.

event.Summary: Port error level ( $v1% ) is above high limit threshold ( $v2% )

description: The percentages of errors on the port that generated the notification.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::monPortErrors

description: High limit in percent of communication errors on port
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::portErrorsThreshold

description: The portsBroadcastExceeded notification indicates that the sending
agent sense that the level of broadcast-limit has passed the
program threshold.

event.Summary: Port broadcast-limit level ( $v1% ) is above high limit threshold ( $v2% )

description: The percentages of packets exceeding broadcast-limit on the port that generated the notification.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::monPortBroadcast

description: High limit in percent of exceeding broadcast-limit on port
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::portsBroadcastThreshold

description: The portsCRCErrExceeded notification indicates that the sending
agent sense that the level of CRC error has passed the
program threshold.

event.Summary: Port CRC error level ( $v1% ) is above high limit threshold ( $v2% )

description: The percentage of CRC errors on the port that generated the notification.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::monPortCRCErr

description: High limit in percent of exceeding CRC error on port
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::portsCRCErrThreshold

description: The portsRuntsExceeded notification indicates that the sending
agent sense that the level of runts has passed the
program threshold.

event.Summary: Port runt packets level ( $v1% ) is above high limit threshold ( $v2% )

description: The percentage of runt packets on the port that generated the notification.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::monPortRunts

description: High limit in percent of exceeding runts on port
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::portsRuntsThreshold

description: The portsOverSizeExceeded notification indicates that the sending
agent sense that the level of oversize has passed the
program threshold.

event.Summary: Port over-size packets level ( $v1% ) is above high limit threshold ( $v2% )

description: The percentage of over-size packets on the port that generated the notification.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::monPortOverSize

description: High limit in percent of exceeding over-size on port
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::portsOverSizeThreshold

description: The laserTemperatureThresholdCrossed shall be generated
when laserTemperature rises above laserHighTemperatureThreshold
or falls below laserTemperatureLowThreshold. Also the
notification shall be generated when laserTemperature
returns to the normal range between laserHighTemperatureThreshold
and laserTemperatureLowThreshold.

Summary.eval: ($v1 > $v2) ? 'Laser temperature ( $v1 C ) is above high threshold ( $v2 C )' : (($v1 < $v3) ? 'Laser temperature ( $v1 C ) is below low threshold ( $v3 C )' : 'Laser temperature has returned to normal range')

description: Represents module temperature.
The range is -128 to 128. The accuracy is 1C.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserTemperature

description: Configures high temperature threshold. The range is -128 to 128. The accuracy is 1C.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserTemperatureHighThreshold

description: Configures low temperature threshold. The range is -128 to 128. The accuracy is 1C.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserTemperatureLowThreshold

description: The laserTxPowerThresholdCrossed shall be generated
when laserTxPower rises above laserHighTxPowerThreshold
or falls below laserTxPowerLowThreshold. Also the
notification shall be generated when laserTxPower
returns to the normal range between
laserHighTxPowerThreshold and laserTxPowerLowThreshold.

Summary.eval: ($v1 > $v2) ? 'Laser Tx power ( $v1 ) is above high threshold ( $v2 )' : (($v1 < $v3) ? 'Laser Tx power ( $v1 ) is below low threshold ( $v3 C )' : 'Laser Tx power has returned to normal range')

description: Represents Tx power. The range is -40 to 8.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserTxPower

description: Configures Tx power high threshold. The range is -40 to 8.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserTxPowerHighThreshold

description: Configures Tx power low threshold. The range is -40 to 8.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserTxPowerLowThreshold

description: The laserRxPowerThresholdCrossed shall be generated
when laserRxPower rises above laserHighRxPowerThreshold
or falls below laserRxPowerLowThreshold. Also the
notification shall be generated when laserRxPower
returns to the normal range between
laserHighRxPowerThreshold and laserRxPowerLowThreshold.

Summary.eval: ($v1 > $v2) ? 'Laser Rx power ( $v1 ) is above high threshold ( $v2 )' : (($v1 < $v3) ? 'Laser Rx power ( $v1 ) is below low threshold ( $v3 C )' : 'Laser Rx power has returned to normal range')

description: Represents Rx power. The range is -40 to 8.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserRxPower

description: Configures Rx power high threshold. The range is -40 to 8.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserRxPowerHighThreshold

description: Configures Rx power low threshold. The range is -40 to 8.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::laserRxPowerLowThreshold

description: This trap will be send only if the SFP is inserted or extracted

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? 'SFP has been inserted' : (($v1 == 2) ? 'SFP has been extracted' : 'SFP status is unknown')

description: This object gives information is SFP is inserted or not in the port.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-MON-MIB::sfpMonStatus
